turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking about ordering a pizza from Tom's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need 4 pie's. The first with everything except anchovies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the second will be all meat with a stuffed crust well done.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the third pizza is vegetarian with a thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: finally we want one with just cheese and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, did you want any sauce, bread sticks or wings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No just the pizza's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok that will be fine.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the cost of all this?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well for 4 pizza's one with everything but anchovies, one with all meat well done, one veggie & one with cheese and mushrooms. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes but the one with all meat also has stuffed!!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh ok got it. the total cost will be $40.42. pizza order is complete and the pizzas will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes. I have sent the receipt to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please include a %10 tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When you arrive to sign for it, you can add it then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a bunch!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome!
